A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fantastic movie. I think it’s the cool thing to do to hate on this movie right now\, hence all the low ratings. I’ve seen it twice\, it’s even more amazing the second time around as there is SO much to digest the first go through. Really good. People who hate the humor? Original franchise had humor too. It’s wasn’t childish then\, so why is it now? Just because you’re a bit older doesn’t mean other generations can’t be given something to enjoy too. Something for everyone in this movie\, A+
